mapper.sql: ${alias}.payment_num as ${prefix}payment_num, ${alias}.user_num as ${prefix}user_num, ${alias}.payment_title as ${prefix}payment_title, ${alias}.payment_desc as ${prefix}payment_desc, ${alias}.payment_cost as ${prefix}payment_cost, ${alias}.record_type as ${prefix}record_type, D19(${alias}.record_date) as ${prefix}record_date, D19(${alias}.create_date) as ${prefix}create_date, D19(${alias}.update_date) as ${prefix}update_date
mapper.select:
select
from payment_record paymentRecord where payment_num=#{paymentNum}
